name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auctionoton: Auction House Prices for Wowhead

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display current Auction House price data for items on wowhead.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a new tooltip to items on wowhead.com (classic only)! It will show up-to-date Auction House price information for your selected server. You can select the region, server, and faction you want.
